resources.string: Before start, please watch these few introduction slides to see important information.
On the first run, two offline demos are created to get started. Use them to get the feeling how app works.
To use real terminal sessions, Green Screens Terminal Service is required. You have to setup application to point to the Green Screens Service URL.
To learn how to use application, select Tutorial from application main menu This will open short video tutorials on YouTube.
For any questions, contact us through contact form at our web site at www.greenscreens.io.
